statements: SELECT * FROM customer_accounts
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC
SELECT id, first_name, last_name FROM customer_accounts WHERE id = 5
SELECT first_name, address FROM customer_accounts WHERE last_name LIKE 'Smith%'
SELECT id, phone_number FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, first_name, address FROM customer_accounts WHERE id > 100 AND address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT last_name, phone_number FROM customer_accounts WHERE first_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts WHERE id IN (1, 5, 8, 10)
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, first_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL AND phone_number LIKE '555%';

SELECT orders.order_id, customers.first_name, customers.last_name, orders.total_amount FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE orders.total_amount < 500 AND customers.last_name <> 'Doe';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE zip_code = '12345';
SELECT customer_id, contact_type, contact_detail FROM contacts WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT first_name, last_name, city FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM customers JOIN addresses ON customers.customer_id = addresses.customer_id;
SELECT contact_type, contact_detail FROM contacts WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY contact_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, street_address, city, state, zip_code FROM customers JOIN addresses ON customers.customer_id = addresses.customer_id ORDER BY customer_id ASC, state DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT full_name, address, contact_number FROM customers ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, full_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_amount < 500;
SELECT address_line1, city, state FROM addresses WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, address, phone_number FROM customer_accounts WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM customer_addresses ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM customer_orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_addresses WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM customer_orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS full_name, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT contact_type, contact_value FROM customer_contacts WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY contact_id DESC;
